sentences: Ma ei või sulle midagi öelda - see on kõik lihtsalt tapad!
See polnud ilmselt ainuke juhend tapadesse.
Kui sa ei tea, kuidas midagi teha, siis oled lihtsalt tapades.
context: The word 'tapad' refers to a situation that has gone wrong or is in disarray. It can be used both literally and metaphorically to describe something chaotic or a complete failure. In the examples, it's shown being used for physical situations (like falling into snowdrifts) as well as metaphorical ones (like not knowing what to do).
